text.section: Each nonprofit health service plan that provides hospital benefits shall furnish a statement of the plan's principal claims practices as part of the certificate form or booklet describing the coverage to be afforded.

The statement shall include practices for payment for:
surgical procedures performed by two or more surgeons;
services provided in-area by nonparticipating providers; and
services provided out-of-area by affiliated plans and affiliated providers.
